text: Handbal Volendam or KRAS/Volendam (sponsor name) is a Dutch handball team located in Volendam. Their home matches are played at the Sporthal Opperdam. They compete in NHV Eredivisie and Beneliga. ==Accomplishments== *NHV Eredivisie: **Winners (7) : 2005, 2006, 2007, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 **Runner- Up (2) : 2008, 2015 *Beneliga - Benelux Liga - BENE-League: **Winners (3) : 2010, 2011, 2012 **Runner-Up (2) : 2009, 2013 *Dutch Handball Cup: **Winners (8) : 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2012, 2013, 2014 ==European record == {| class="wikitable" ! Season ! Competition ! Round ! Club ! 1st leg ! 2nd leg !
